column1: Alders were deciduous trees that grew in Middle-earth
column3: such as those that bordered the Water west of Hobbiton
column4: and by the brooks between Weather Hills and Midgewater Marshes.. They also were mentioned in the songs of Tom Bombadil to have grown by the banks of Withywindle.; .

column1: The elves of Rivendell mentioned alders in their song under the window of Bilbo Baggins: "Lullaby! Lullaby! Alder and Willow!"..

column2: alders were known to have grown in the First Age in Dorthonion by the lake Aeluin..
